verses.text: \w Now|strong="H3947"\w* \w Abraham|strong="H3947"\w* had \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* \w another|strong="H3254"\w* wife, \w named|strong="H8034"\w* \w Keturah|strong="H6989"\w*,

\w and|strong="H4080"\w* she \w bore|strong="H3205"\w* \w him|strong="H3205"\w* \w Zimran|strong="H2175"\w*, \w Jokshan|strong="H3370"\w*, \w Medan|strong="H4091"\w*, \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w*, \w Ishbak|strong="H3435"\w*, \w and|strong="H4080"\w* \w Shuah|strong="H7744"\w*.

\w Jokshan|strong="H3370"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w father|strong="H3205"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Sheba|strong="H7614"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Dedan|strong="H1719"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Dedan|strong="H1719"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* Asshurites, \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w Letushites|strong="H3912"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* Leummites.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ephah|strong="H5891"\w*, \w Epher|strong="H6081"\w*, \w Hanoch|strong="H2585"\w*, Abida, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Eldaah. \w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Keturah|strong="H6989"\w*.
Abraham \w left|strong="H5414"\w* \w everything|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* owned \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w*.

\w But|strong="H5750"\w* \w while|strong="H5750"\w* \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w was|strong="H3327"\w* \w still|strong="H5750"\w* \w alive|strong="H2416"\w*, Abraham \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w gifts|strong="H4979"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w concubines|strong="H6370"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w away|strong="H7971"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* land \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w east|strong="H6924"\w*. The Death of Abraham
Abraham \w lived|strong="H2416"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* total \w of|strong="H3117"\w* 175 \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5971"\w* \w at|strong="H4191"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w ripe|strong="H2896"\w* \w old|strong="H2205"\w* \w age|strong="H7872"\w* \w he|strong="H5971"\w* \w breathed|strong="H1478"\w* \w his|strong="H1478"\w* \w last|strong="H1478"\w* \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*, \w old|strong="H2205"\w* \w and|strong="H5971"\w* contented, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w was|strong="H2896"\w* gathered \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w his|strong="H1478"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w His|strong="H6440"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w* \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w cave|strong="H4631"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Machpelah|strong="H4375"\w* \w near|strong="H6440"\w* \w Mamre|strong="H4471"\w*, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ephron|strong="H6085"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zohar|strong="H6714"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Hittite|strong="H2850"\w*.

\w This|strong="H1121"\w* \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H8033"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w that|strong="H1121"\w* Abraham \w had|strong="H1121"\w* \w bought|strong="H7069"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H8033"\w* Hittites. Abraham \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w with|strong="H8033"\w* \w his|strong="H8283"\w* wife \w Sarah|strong="H8283"\w*.

\w After|strong="H1961"\w* Abraham’s \w death|strong="H4194"\w*, God \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w his|strong="H1288"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w*, \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w lived|strong="H3427"\w* \w near|strong="H5973"\w* Beer-lahai-roi. The Descendants of Ishmael (1 Chronicles 1:28–31)

\w This|strong="H1121"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w account|strong="H8435"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Abraham’s \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w*, whom \w Hagar|strong="H1904"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w Egyptian|strong="H4713"\w*, \w Sarah|strong="H8283"\w*’s \w maidservant|strong="H8198"\w*, \w bore|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H3205"\w* Abraham.

These \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3458"\w* \w names|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3458"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3458"\w* \w order|strong="H8435"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* their \w birth|strong="H8435"\w*: \w Nebaioth|strong="H5032"\w* \w the|strong="H3458"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w*, \w then|strong="H1121"\w* \w Kedar|strong="H6938"\w*, Adbeel, \w Mibsam|strong="H4017"\w*,
\w Mishma|strong="H4927"\w*, \w Dumah|strong="H1746"\w*, \w Massa|strong="H4854"\w*,
\w Hadad|strong="H2301"\w*, \w Tema|strong="H8485"\w*, \w Jetur|strong="H3195"\w*, \w Naphish|strong="H5305"\w*, \w and|strong="H5305"\w* \w Kedemah|strong="H6929"\w*.

\w These|strong="H1992"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3458"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w these|strong="H1992"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w names|strong="H8034"\w* \w by|strong="H8034"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w villages|strong="H2691"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w encampments|strong="H2918"\w*—\w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w princes|strong="H5387"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* tribes.

\w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w* \w lived|strong="H2416"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* total \w of|strong="H8141"\w* 137 \w years|strong="H8141"\w*. \w Then|strong="H4191"\w* \w he|strong="H8141"\w* \w breathed|strong="H1478"\w* \w his|strong="H3458"\w* \w last|strong="H1478"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w was|strong="H8141"\w* gathered \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w his|strong="H3458"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

Ishmael’s descendants \w settled|strong="H7931"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w Havilah|strong="H2341"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w Shur|strong="H7793"\w*, \w which|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w near|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* border \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w go|strong="H5307"\w* \w toward|strong="H5921"\w* Asshur.\f + \fr 25:18 \ft Or Assyria\f* \w And|strong="H4714"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w lived|strong="H7931"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* hostility \w toward|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* brothers. Jacob and Esau (Malachi 1:1–5; Romans 9:6–29)

\w This|strong="H1121"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w account|strong="H8435"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Abraham’s \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w*. Abraham \w became|strong="H3205"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w father|strong="H3205"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w*,

\w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* forty \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H8141"\w* \w married|strong="H3947"\w* \w Rebekah|strong="H7259"\w*, \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Bethuel|strong="H1328"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* Aramean \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w Paddan-aram|strong="H6307"\w* \f + \fr 25:20 \ft That is, northwest Mesopotamia\f* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* sister \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Laban|strong="H3837"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* Aramean.

Later, \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w* \w prayed|strong="H6279"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w behalf|strong="H5227"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* wife, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w barren|strong="H6135"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w heard|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w prayer|strong="H6279"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* wife \w Rebekah|strong="H7259"\w* \w conceived|strong="H2029"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w inside|strong="H7130"\w* \w her|strong="H7130"\w* \w struggled|strong="H7533"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w each|strong="H2088"\w* \w other|strong="H2088"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w she|strong="H3651"\w* \w said|strong="H3651"\w*, “\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* happening \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w me|strong="H1875"\w*?” \w So|strong="H3651"\w* Rebekah \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w inquire|strong="H1875"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*,

\w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w He|strong="H3068"\w* declared \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w her|strong="H8147"\w*: “\w Two|strong="H8147"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w are|strong="H1471"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w womb|strong="H4578"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w peoples|strong="H3816"\w* \w from|strong="H1471"\w* \w within|strong="H4578"\w* \w you|strong="H5647"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w separated|strong="H6504"\w*; \w one|strong="H6810"\w* \w people|strong="H3816"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* stronger \w than|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5647"\w* \w other|strong="H8147"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5647"\w* \w older|strong="H7227"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w the|strong="H5647"\w* \w younger|strong="H6810"\w*.”\f + \fr 25:23 \ft Cited in Romans 9:12\f*

\w When|strong="H3117"\w* \w her|strong="H4390"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* came \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w give|strong="H3205"\w* \w birth|strong="H3205"\w*, \w there|strong="H2009"\w* \w were|strong="H3117"\w* \w indeed|strong="H2009"\w* \w twins|strong="H8380"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w her|strong="H4390"\w* womb.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* red, covered \w with|strong="H3318"\w* \w hair|strong="H8181"\w* \w like|strong="H3318"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* fur coat; \w so|strong="H7121"\w* \w they|strong="H3605"\w* \w named|strong="H7121"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w* \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w*.\f + \fr 25:25 \ft Esau sounds like a Hebrew term that means hairy.\f*

\w After|strong="H3318"\w* \w this|strong="H3651"\w*, \w his|strong="H7121"\w* brother \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* grasping \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w*’s \w heel|strong="H6119"\w*; \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w named|strong="H7121"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*.\f + \fr 25:26 \ft Jacob means he grasps the heel or he deceives.\f* \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w sixty|strong="H8346"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* \w when|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* twins \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w born|strong="H3205"\w*.

\w When|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* \w boys|strong="H5288"\w* \w grew|strong="H1431"\w* \w up|strong="H1431"\w*, \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w* \w became|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w skillful|strong="H3045"\w* \w hunter|strong="H6718"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H5288"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, \w while|strong="H1961"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* quiet \w man|strong="H5288"\w* \w who|strong="H3427"\w* \w stayed|strong="H3427"\w* \w at|strong="H3427"\w* home.

\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w taste|strong="H6310"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* wild \w game|strong="H6718"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* loved \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w*; \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w Rebekah|strong="H7259"\w* loved \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*. Esau Sells His Birthright

\w One|strong="H4480"\w* day, \w while|strong="H1931"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* cooking \w some|strong="H4480"\w* \w stew|strong="H5138"\w*, \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w* came \w in|strong="H4480"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w and|strong="H7704"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w famished|strong="H5889"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, “\w Let|strong="H4994"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* eat \w some|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* red stew, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am \w famished|strong="H5889"\w*.” (\w That|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w why|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w also|strong="H8034"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* Edom.\f + \fr 25:30 \ft Edom means red.\f*)
“\w First|strong="H3117"\w* \w sell|strong="H4376"\w* \w me|strong="H3117"\w* \w your|strong="H4376"\w* \w birthright|strong="H1062"\w*,” \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* replied.

“\w Look|strong="H2009"\w*,” said \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w*, “\w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w am|strong="H1980"\w* \w about|strong="H1980"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, \w so|strong="H1980"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w good|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w birthright|strong="H1062"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w me|strong="H4191"\w*?”

“\w Swear|strong="H7650"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w me|strong="H3117"\w* \w first|strong="H3117"\w*,” \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* said. \w So|strong="H7650"\w* Esau \w swore|strong="H7650"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* \w him|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w birthright|strong="H1062"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H6965"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* some \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w lentil|strong="H5742"\w* \w stew|strong="H5138"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w*, \w who|strong="H6215"\w* ate \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w drank|strong="H8354"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w then|strong="H6965"\w* \w got|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w away|strong="H3212"\w*. Thus \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w* despised \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w birthright|strong="H1062"\w*.
